QuestData.Title: Mysterious Masks
QuestData.Description: The village, my friends, gone. They are no more.$b$bI came back from the nearby grove to find them... like this. Even Lavrash, my best friend! He came at me with only violence in his heart.$b$bThey are all wearing these masks now, and they are not themselves anymore.$b$bPlease, deliver them from this fate. Bring me their masks and perhaps we can decipher this mystery.
QuestData.RewardText: These masks must provide some clue to what's causing the possessions.
